OpenRAVE::SensorSystemBase

クラス SensorSystemBase
[Base Interface Classes]

[interface] Used to manage the creation and destruction of bodies. See Sensor System Concepts. [詳細]

#include <sensorsystem.h>

XMLReadableConstPtr  pdata

virtual bool SwitchBody ( KinBodyPtr  pbody1,
KinBodyPtr  pbody2 
) [pure virtual]

switches the registrations of two bodies. Can be used to quickly change the models of the current bodies

引数:
pbody1 First body to switch
pbody2 Second body to switch
